articles.author: Ashley Hume
articles.title: 'American Idol' contestant calls Katy Perry’s ‘mom-shaming' joke 'hurtful' and 'embarrassing' - Fox News
articles.description: "American Idol" contestant Sara Beth Liebe shared her reaction to a "mom-shaming" joke that judge Katy Perry made during her audition. Liebe said that the joke was "hurtful" and "embarrassing."
articles.content: Katy Perry was called out by "American Idol" contestant Sara Beth Liebe who said that she was "hurt" and "embarrassed" after the judge made a "mom-shaming" joke during her audition earlier this month… [+3968 chars]
